snippet.title: Samurai Zero - The World of Edo
snippet.description:
More than swordsmanship and ancient powers, the Samurai have conflicts both deeply personal and with the state of the world. Become invested in an eclectic cast and bear witness to the journeys they take on to change both themselves, and the world of Edo.

Support on Patreon: https://patreon.com/neointeractive/
Get Merch: https://merch.samuraizero.com/
Visit the Website: https://samuraizero.com/ 
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/playsamuraizero/
